title.label: One of the best games ever

content.label: This game is just amazing worth the money I like the design of the characters The puddles were nice and challenging but that’s one of my problems because this game could get really hard but besides that it’s a good game.

title.label: One of the BEST games ever

content.label: No exaggeration either. The characters are endless, each unique and with their own special sounds, are the cutest of any game I’ve played, of course, after the characters in Samorost 3 - by the same developer. I can’t even describe in words how well this game is made. It boggles my mind that those developers, whose heads popped out of the jack-in-the-box, came up with the ideas in this game. It’s unlike any game I’ve ever seen or played. It’s so unique, imaginative, beautiful, creative, and I could go on and on. It took me all day to complete the game and it was so much fun the entire time. I laughed out loud so many times. I can’t get over how well done this game is!!! It’s THAT GOOD. This game (and Samorost 3) are my favorite games of all time and I highly recommend them if you are looking for a great game with hours of play time. I’ve played every game by Amanita and I’m eagerly awaiting Creaks. Thanks to the devs for making the absolute best games out there!
Beautiful game. Just what I was looking for. Similar to Samaria 3, but different and certainly my it’s own game.
my daughter did not enjoy this game after tge 5th level. i think it gets harder to move the characters especially on a touchscreen.

Ok gaming but I keep getting lost trying to find my way or get back to where I need to go. Lost interest in the game. Good game but not for me. Amanita nailed it with games like Machinarium and Samorost 3

title.label: All the games by Amanita are great!

content.label: Played most of them and they were all great games.
I love this game....love the developer! They make gorgeous, fun, thoughtful games. Can’t get enough of these guys.
Paid $5. So far hasn’t done anything.

What game are you guys playing? This is terrible. It won’t do anything and there is no explanation of what in the world the game is about. I hate that I paid for nothing. Would be nice if the game actually did something. First board and nothing happens no matter where I tap. I want a refund!

title.label: Just bought it, already HATE it !!!!( !!! )

content.label:
Another one of these extremely incomprehensible games with too much animation, zero logic & designed merely to frustrate The player into complete madness !
Every game should start off insanely easy to give The player The encouragement to continue to The levels where playing actually begins, instead of immediately urging them to quit.
$10 already forgotten, deleting this monstrosity right now!
It’s a good game!

title.label: What’s up with the big red fig edit The end

content.label: Good day
Well done Amanita!
Sounds corny but what an unforgettable adventure! Loved it and a great storyline, you really feel like you have a purpose. Great job!!

title.label: great game, but I want more!

content.label: this game only took me 3 days to get through. I wish it was longer. still worth the graphics and storyline though. I loved it!!

title.label: One of the most wonderful games I’ve played ever

content.label: This is a fabulous game that requires patience, thought, and attention.  You help a little posse of a seed and his friends to save a tree. The graphics, the storyline, the puzzles are all so richly entertaining and rewarding.  You cheer along with the posse as you save the tree from the scourge.  I write this with a tinge of sadness; I have played this on-and-off since January and I finally finished, wanting to take each step on its own.  And now I am done...and I am sad. Thank you to the very talented and inspiring developers for Botanicula!

I tried very hard to like this game. It is so visually appealing and seemed like it would be calm and lovely and fun. The first time I opened it, I was frustrated because I just didn’t understand what to do. I gave it three more tries on different days and got through a few levels but ultimately just kept going up and down the same branches feeling trapped . . . and that no option was left for me to move on. Frustrating. Many seem to like it so I must be missing something. I guess this game is not for me . . . deleted.
Want to take advantage of screen real estate with this beautiful game. Thx.
More than a game, an experience.  Brilliant and well done both audio and visual.  Loved every level and part of this journey.
This is my favorite game I’ve ever played it is sooooo fun all of your games are my top 3 ( because I don’t have chucel) but I’m going to get it this week
Being cute in a natural way, not cheesy way!!!!!! Love it!

title.label: Still the most amazing game ever

content.label: The graphics are beautiful, the game controls are wonderful & i’m not sure why some people have problems but mine goes to auto save. Play it it at least three times in the past year and it’s still amazing every time I play it! I would definitely recommend and since I love all their games I hope these developers come out with a new game soon!

title.label: Talk about an outer body experience kind of game

content.label:
Can I just say that whoever came up with the idea/plot and visuals of this game are absolutely whole heartedly talented people!!!! The way you figure out the puzzles and the different worlds and different creatures... I could just go on and on. Figuring out the puzzles really put your brain to work while giving you a sense of actually playing a game at the same time. Wow. I definitely recommend it you guys. I bought the bundle pack and am currently on Machinarium, so Samorost will be last. Can’t wait to see more from these developers. (An under the sea version would be to die for, give me a cut if you use this idea please lol -no but seriously.)

Ana
I really don’t have any complaints about this game. I was just stoked about it the whole time. There was so much thought put into it, with each minute thing to discover. I’m sad it’s over!

title.label: None of the genie scenes ever complete.

content.label: All the genie scenes fail to complete. iPhone 6s+, iOS 11.3.1

Wonderful tiny, unique critters, in little worlds where everything behaves oddly. Strange challenges. Engaging & rewarding. 

    :: I wasn't interested in iPad games until I began exploring with my grandson. This game is the most amazing, creative experience. 
Signed: 
Artist, retired graphic designer, and 74 yr old grandmother.
The game has a bug in the elements chapter and an inventory item is gone (sun element). I cannot go any farther now. Otherwise a charming game.

title.label: Bugs cause the game to be stuck middle way

content.label: Had to abandon the game. Can’t get the star box after collecting 8 blue buds. It’s a long existing bug...

title.label: Adorable. Should have played it a long time ago!

content.label: Thank you Amanita Designs for another wonderful game.  Love the music, the atmosphere, the story, the little heroes, everything!  Such creativity!  Love all your games. They are like a peaceful oasis in the middle of a war zone...   Please, please, please make more!
Makes no sense. No directions, totally arbitrary. A disgrace to the App Store.

This game is diverse, hard and extremely weird. I loved machinerium (Not sure how to spell it) and samorost 3,  so I bought this one. This was on the same level of “Favoriteness” than both samorost 3 and machinerium! This game was cute and weird. Weirdly wonderful! There is no earthly logic involved, but who cares! If you don’t want to be super stressed out by your inexperience, then don’t get this one, but I encourage it if you want to take your time. Good luck!

If you love puzzle games, please play ALL. Of their games! Botanicula, Samorost 3, Machinarium! All of them are excellent, challenging, beautifully designed, and will keep you interested for hours! Best bundle
Purchase I’ve ever made for games on the App Store!
The best game I’ve ever played! Botanicula is truly a work of art!

Absolutely beautiful and creative, but very difficult. Would love to see the beauty of the rest of the game, but am dead ended. Doubt I'll ever finish it. Not very intuitive really hard to figure out the correct responses. YouTube help videos were good in some levels. But the artwork and level of creativity deserves awards.
I love the art and the puzzles are on point I love that you come up with such good story lines too!
Please update Kooky to work with ios11, pleeeeeease!

I've had this game for over a year but this is the first time I persisted and got all the way thru.  Yay, me!  Now I'm sorry it's over.
It is absolutely charming and one I'd happily share with my grandkids.   Seniors like me aren't too keen on the mostly gruesome and gory adventure/escape games.    Amanita seems to get that with Machinarium and Samorost.
The challenges are pretty intuitive in what you need to do, although some walkthrough help was needed to see just how to do.   But all are doable.
Will return to this someday in the future.   But please make more!  And can you make Samorost 1 & 2 playable on iPads, please?
Come from playing machinarium. Cannot wait to play more from amanita design!

It’s a cute, but somewhat lacking game. Atmosphere and art is phenomenal but gameplay is pretty bland. Not worth a ton of money; wait for a sale.
Mechanarium is better imo. I suggest considering that instead, if you haven’t played it already.

I love how in this game there is a whole team, and the story line is very clear 

P.S. played game twice

No instructions, no hints, end up running up and down the same brand 50 times. The creatures do next to impossible this one time and then are scared of their own shadows the next. I'm collecting keys and see a key but my monsters are scared of the scorpion and apparently only one of my creatures is useful, the rest are just there for moral support and would stand there and watch the useful on get eaten. I can't reason with them. I have buyers remorse.
I haven’t played the game but I purchased the soundtrack - it’s that good!
Great job!! Wonderful graphic!!! All their three games are the most favorite !!
This game is so good I don't know where to begin. Beautiful art, incredible music, very unique _and_ super cute little characters! I'm just sad I finished it :'(

title.label: Just love your smart ideas and pleasurable retreats!

content.label: All games created by this developer are so pleasurable. I always wish they were longer but know there will be other games and worlds to explore! So smart relaxing and really fun!
Great music and story. Delightful artwork!

Stupid pretentious waste of money. 
One star is too many.
Bad citizen....fire this game up no it plays its music even if mute is on!    No sound off setting within the game that I can find either.

Please try to simplify the dripping water puzzle or at the very least please provide some in game hints so that you don't need to understand any high level math like the angle of refraction formula and the like too...

I loved the art style throughout this game! Everything gave you the feeling of being back in a childhood fairy tale. The gameplay was fantastic as well! Every puzzle was intuitive and interesting enough to keep me playing the game. All over a great game and a good time.
